Publish.LongDescription:
# System Time Widget
A stylish and functional widget for displaying system time directly in your game!
## ✨ Features
- **Modern Design** — Glassmorphic UI with blur effect matching Cities: Skylines 2 style - **Draggable** — Place the widget anywhere on your screen - **Smooth Animations** — Fluid transitions and rotating icons on hover - **Extended Info** — Hover to reveal date and live status - **Minimal Impact** — Optimized code with zero performance impact - **Streamer Friendly** — Always know how long you've been playing!
Enjoy! 🏙️
